title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, December 17, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of Penelope Fitzgerald (1916), who wrote, “I believe that people should write biographies only about people they love, or understand, or both”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Penelope Fitzgerald (1916), who wrote, “I believe that people should write biographies only about people they love, or understand, or both”
